data.message: fucking Christians man, my dad he has a street ministry & office down town & everything, he beats my mom & me, one of his female native American friends gives him a young female husky & he has a newspaper rolled up & taped, every night goes into the back yard & beats that poor little girl, he reaches out to other women who have abusive husbands & he's the right guy to minister, ministering to women all night long while that woman's boy friend is right there, fucking Christians, fucking Christians evangelizing the strippers at the club taking selfies & everything, fucking righteous POS,

replies.message: with my dad that's not even half the story, I Personally Know What You Went Through,
